content:
She was beautiful in her own ways..
The ways she tucked her hair everytime the wind blew..
The ways her eyes widened and shone brilliantly whenever she talked about her dreams..
The ways ice cream managed to find its place right up on her nose while she seemed to be in another parallel universe licking her ice cone..damn..!!
Her loose sweat shirt..
With house shorts..
Messy bun..
Eyes deeper than sea..

You know..
She never knew her beauty was her simplicity..
Her ways to make others feel special..
Her random acts of kindness towards the unknown..
Towards those who seemed to be abandoned by this society..

She was simple..
The simplest..
Yet genuine..
Yet one in a million..
author: MrAmlya
title: She was beautiful in her own ways..
